channel.title: possessions on Michaela
channel.description: Recent content in possessions on Michaela

item.title: Decluttering
item.description: 6 things you should get rid of by Jenny Mustard https://youtu.be/i0mmVVVpAAg Things you don’t need, don’t love. Maybe one day Just in case ‘So-so’ clothes ‘For now’ (that we will use until we find or can afford the better version) ‘I should’ (tools for improvement that make you feel bad about yourself) ‘If only’ (we quit our jobs, but a nice house,…) Process/System Principles No need to store up treasures on earth No need to be anxious about clothing Someone may benefit from your possessions more than you would1 Do everything for God’s glory If you had to give an account to God for every item you own, what would God think?

item.title: Hold all things loosely
item.description: On Sunday, we went through 1 John 2:12-17, however, 1 John 2:15–17 is a bit more relevant to this thought. Do not love the world or the things in the world. If anyone loves the world, the love of the Father is not in him. For all that is in the world—the desires of the flesh and the desires of the eyes and pride of life—is not from the Father but is from the world.
